import { Component } from 'react'; import formation from "../../components/formation" class LoginPage extends Component{ state ={ username : "", mail:"", password:"" } getData = async(mail) =>{ const response = await fetch(`/showuser/${mail}`); const body = await response.json(); if (response.status !=200) throw Error(body.message); return body; } login=()=>{ console.log("AAGGG") } componentDidMount() { this.getData() .then(res=>{ const data = res; this.setState({formation: data}); }) } render(){ return (

Connection

Connectez vous dans notre monde numerique
et profitez de la magie!

) } } function SignUppage(){ return (

Inscription

Debutez votre voyage numerique

un monde plein d'adventure !

) } export {LoginPage, SignUppage}
